trigger.name: Zero vnstat Bandwidth Monitor Interlaces Discovered
trigger.event_name: Zero vnstat Bandwidth Monitor Interlaces Discovered
trigger.description:
Zero interfaces were found by discovery using vnstat.
NOTE, discovery uses vnstat --ifstats for discovery.
Have you enabled and configured vnstat?
